Reviews.Content: hotel excellent location sultanahmet close main attractions tucked alley provides relaxing atmosphere probably hotels similar location advantages sultanahmet difference atmosphere inside hotel reviewers mentioned feeling welcome home stayed double bed furniture bed comfortable decor nice owner staff friendly helpful tips eat lent utensils cut fruit bought bathroom tiny fan bit loud didnt mind negatives 1 sound proof hear footsteps outside walking updown stairs stay level hear chatter reception bit annoying 2 maintance hotel stay didnt hear noise day stepped tool fell construction staff outside entrance wasnt close hitting overall highly recommend modern sultan hotel returned leg trip turkey spend days nice time
